title: Shares of several industrial companies are trading lower amid market weakness following US unemployment data and recent cautious comments from the WHO. Sentiment is also negative following cautious comments from Fed Chair Powell and bearish outlook from some major US investors on Wednesday. Cautious economic sentiment has potentially hampered the outlook for industrial output and investment.
